school_name: New York City College of Technology
comments: Each class u get 3 grades.Class starts 8.30 on 8.31 he marks you late. Curses in German. No tests but 4 each class you have to learn the next topic and right it in your notebook, do MSDs for all the chemicals you\'ll use and finish the privious class report,hand it in on time. My 1st report I got 100 but then he changed it to 60 -"no partner\'s name"

school_name: New York City College of Technology
comments: For all you students who will take DH or anything for Dental, you should take him as your Chem 1000 lab...There is no quizzes or exams! Attendance is a must so BE ON TIME! he deducts points for being late...But overall, his class is easy! All you gotta do is do the lab and lab report is just copying procedure from book. Easy A!!!

school_name: New York City College of Technology
comments: Had him for Orgo 2. One of the worst professors ever. Actually, that is giving him too much credit. Be prepared to learn everything on your own and scratch your head whenever things are marked incorrect on the exams. Save your time and take Orgo 2 with someone else.

school_name: New York City College of Technology
comments: Extremely poor professor. No method to his madness in grading. Just walk away for your own sake

school_name: New York City College of Technology
comments: I would avoid taking this professor. Recites from slides, but when asked about the topic, can never give a clear answer. Tests are randomly marked with points taken off nonsensically. I was extremely frustrated because he doesn\'t realize that he\'ll say something that completely differed from the textbook. If you don\'t know it, you won\'t learn it.

school_name: New York City College of Technology
comments: Very hard class. If you are not good in chemistry..DO NOT TAKE HIS CLASS. The test and final exams are open book, but they are very hard. He doesn\'t teach well and he is very into himself. BEWARE
